'''''Mythlore'' 91''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol24/iss1/ Volume 24, Issue 1]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* King, Don W. "The Anatomy of a Friendship: The Correspondence of Ruth Pitter and C.S. Lewis, 1946-1962."
* Le Lievre, Kerrie Anne. "Wizards and Wainscots: Generic Structures and Genre Themes in the Harry Potter Series."
* Alexander, Joy. "‘The Whole Art and Joy of Words’: Aslan’s Speech in the Chronicles of Narnia."
* Healey, Kim Coleman. "Brothers of Perpetual Responsibility: Monasticism, Memory, and Penance in Cassutt, Donaldson, and Straczynski."
* Bowman, Mary R. "A Darker Ignorance: C.S. Lewis and the Nature of the Fall."

====Reviews====

* ''The Role of Imagination in Culture and Society: Owen Barfield’s Early Work.'' Astrid Diener. Reviewed by David Lavery.
* ''To Michal from Serge: Letters from Charles Williams to His Wife Florence, 1939-1945.'' ed. Roma King. Reviewed by Scott McLaren.
